name: yourworldoftext black + green
description:
Yourworldoftext.com in black and green.
Easy too change the color of the background, border and text.

The coordinate box will bug with other resolutions than 1280x1024.
If you want to change the position of the coordinate box, just do it.
Use the margin too change the position.

Before: http://img198.imageshack.us/img198/9924/lolz2m.jpg
After: http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/552/omglolz.jpg
